tool_description: Twitter user and client API for post Tweet, like, follow, retweet and more actions.
name: Twitter Premium
title: Twitter Premium

api_list.name: Update Profile
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://twitter-premium.p.rapidapi.com/v1/UpdateProfile/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitter-premium.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
